meanings.definition: The branch of medicine that deals with disorders of the stomach and intestines.
meanings.sent1: Gastroenterology helps doctors understand stomach and intestine problems.
meanings.sent2: She decided to specialize in gastroenterology to help patients with digestive issues.
meanings.sent3: The party was full of jokes about stomach troubles, turning it into a gastroenterology gathering.
meanings.sent4: His ability to diagnose issues quickly made him the gastroenterology expert in the hospital.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on gastroenterology made the complex subject easy to grasp.

meanings.definition: The study of the structure, functions, and diseases of the digestive system.
meanings.sent1: Studying gastroenterology involves learning about how the digestive system works.
meanings.sent2: The university offers a course on gastroenterology for students interested in digestion.
meanings.sent3: The detective approached the case with the precision of a gastroenterology researcher.
meanings.sent4: Her fascination with gastroenterology led her to explore the intricacies of digestion.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit on gastroenterology showcased the wonders of the digestive system.
